meanings.definition: Containing or resembling mucus or pus.
meanings.sent1: The gleety substance oozed from the wound.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the gleety discharge as a sign of infection.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sneeze left a gleety trail on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The old book had a musty, gleety smell.
meanings.sent5: The garbage can emitted a gleety odor that made everyone cringe.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling gleets.
meanings.sent1: The gleety symptoms indicated a possible infection.
meanings.sent2: Her gleety cough worried her friends.
meanings.sent3: The gleety look on his face made her burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The gleety color of the sky before a storm was ominous.
meanings.sent5: The gleety texture of the fabric felt unpleasant against her skin.
